entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@GeraldoRivera @realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden Hey @GeraldoRivera,
The global phenomenon of Hyping CoronaVirus is suspect.
There are so many much deadlier infectious diseases
Why not Hype them?
Tuberculosis
1.8 billion people infected
1.5 million deaths, 4,109 a day
Malaria
228 million infected
584,000 deaths,1,600 per day https://t.co/fkODfsz4gx
